link.title: Wylie News

link.script: (function(d, s, id) {var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];window.key='WF6FXGLT';window.url='//www.k12insight.com/';if (d.getElementById(id))return;js = d.createElement(s);js.id = id;js.src = "//www.k12insight.com/Lets-Talk/LtTabJs.aspx";fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);}(document, 'script', 'Lets-Talk'));

svg.title: Home Button
svg.desc: This logo image brings you back to the homepage

div.div: Download the Dexter CSD App for easy access to school news and parent tasks!

div.p: Looking for a job? All the info you need is here.
Help us tell the world about DCS student and staff achievements!
Want to know more about DCS curriculum? Start here.

div.a: Family Resources from SRSLY Dexter and Project Success

div.div: SRSLY Dexter and Project Success have prepared this booklet of resources for families coping with the COVID-19 pandemic.
Click here for updates on calendar items that are still pending.
An update from Superintendent Chris Timmis regarding concerns about the COVID-19 outbreak.

div.a: Debate + Forensics = Dexter's Speech Activities Team

div.div: Some people assume debate and forensics are the same thing. Click here to read more about these stimulating and rewarding extracurricular activities.

div.a: Grateful Dreads - DHS Basketball - Salute to Staff

div.div: On Friday, February 7th, DHS basketball players honored Dexter staff members who have made a positive impact on their lives.

div.p:
"Aside from the challenge and rigor of Dexter's academics, it is the unique relationships the teachers share with the students that make this school special. I have built relationships with several teachers that will be lifelong. They have personally invested themselves in me: challenging me, supporting me, and being by my side every step of the way. Having them there made all difference in the world.” Stephen Robards
Class of '15
In an effort to serve families more efficiently, we are moving to a tech ticket format. If you need assistance with your child's device or apps, please submit a help ticket using this form.

li.span:
Bates School, 2704 Baker Rd.
Dexter, MI 48130

ul.li: Dexter Community Schools is committed to making our website accessible to visitors with disabilities. If you encounter difficulty navigating this website due to a disability, please email our accessibility team or call 734-424-4102 for assistance.

div.p: The Dexter Community Schools district includes the city of Dexter and parts of eight townships. Learn about the Dexter area on our Community page.
Need to know what's going on? Want to share your news with us? Start with our Communications page.

p.a: Learn more about Dexter Community Schools!

div.p: Forgot to fill out a form? Need to update info? Search our Forms Library.
Use this shortcut to log in to PowerSchool quickly.
Current employee in need of information? Interested in working for the district? Visit Human Resources.
Student athletes, parents, and spectators: here's DCS Athletics headquarters.
Check out our Prospective Parents page.
Looking for a space for your event? Start with our Facilities homepage.

li.a: Dexter Community Schools at a Glance
The City of Dexter & Local Municipalities
